    • Method Detail

      • getBoundingBox

        public BoundingBox getBoundingBox(double x,
                         double y,
                         double scale)
        Get the bounding box for the dimensions of the viewport at the specified scale, centred at the x, y model coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The model x coordinate.
        y - The model y coordinate.
        scale - The scale.
        Returns:
        The bounding box.

      • getBoundingBox

        public BoundingBox getBoundingBox(double x1,
                         double y1,
                         double x2,
                         double y2)
        Get the bounding box in model units for the pair of coordinates in view units. The bounding box will be clipped to the model's bounding box.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The first x value.
        y1 - The first y value.
        x2 - The second x value.
        y2 - The second y value.
        Returns:
        The bounding box.

      • getBoundingBox

        public BoundingBox getBoundingBox(int x,
                         int y,
                         double scale)
        Get the bounding box for the dimensions of the viewport at the specified scale, centred at the x, y view coordinates.
        Parameters:
        x - The view x coordinate.
        y - The view y coordinate.
        scale - The scale.
        Returns:
        The bounding box.

      • getRectangle

        public Rectangle getRectangle(int x1,
                     int y1,
                     int x2,
                     int y2)
        Get the rectangle in view units for the pair of coordinates in view units. The bounding box will be clipped to the view's dimensions.
        Parameters:
        x1 - The first x value.
        y1 - The first y value.
        x2 - The second x value.
        y2 - The second y value.
        Returns:
        The rectangle.
